title: Jeffrey Sachs: Peace is the Result of Diplomacy, Never of War
itunes:title: Jeffrey Sachs: Peace is the Result of Diplomacy, Never of War
description: Columbia University's renowned economist Jeffrey Sachs talks about the lessons he has learned from consulting with governments around the world, about how global problems, such as the war in Ukraine, will only be solved via efforts to understand the other side, never through force.
content:encoded: Columbia University's renowned economist Jeffrey Sachs talks about the lessons he has learned from consulting with governments around the world, about how global problems, such as the war in Ukraine, will only be solved via efforts to understand the other side, never through force.

itunes:author: Institute for New Economic Thinking (INET)
